languages.text: "Раз юный Гапрак так воодушевлен возможностью вести дела с ксеносами, я беру его на службу как торгового представителя. Его дом позаботится, чтобы юноша был полезен, а его служба — безупречна".

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к Гапрак] "Ты прав. Ксеносы — это не только угроза, но и возможности. Взгляни на мои сокровища и скажи — послужишь ли ты мне, преумножив их на посту торгового представителя?"

languages.text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."
languages.original_text: "Раз юный Гапрак так воодушевлен возможностью вести дела с ксеносами, я беру его на службу как торгового представителя. Его дом позаботится, чтобы юноша был полезен, а его служба — безупречна".

traits.locale_text: [Address Gaprak] "You are right. The xenos are not just a threat — they are also an opportunity. Look upon my treasures and tell me — will you serve me by expanding their volume on the position of trade representative?"

"Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

"Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

"Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

"Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

languages.text: 「異種族と取引を行う考えに刺激を受けたというなら、ヤング・ギャプラックには交易代表者として私に仕えてもらいたい。ギャプラック家をあげてその価値を示し、申し分の無い働きをするよう、計らうがいい」
languages.original_text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族と取引を行う考えに刺激を受けたというなら、ヤング・ギャプラックには交易代表者として私に仕えてもらいたい。ギャプラック家をあげてその価値を示し、申し分の無い働きをするよう、計らうがいい」

languages.text: “既然年轻的贾帕克热衷于与异形做生意，我愿意指派他做我的贸易代表。他的家族需要确保他的贡献和服务无可指摘。”
languages.original_text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

traits.locale_text: “既然年轻的贾帕克热衷于与异形做生意，我愿意指派他做我的贸易代表。他的家族需要确保他的贡献和服务无可指摘。”

languages.text: «Puesto que el joven Gaprak está tan fascinado por la idea de negociar con xenos, lo acogeré como representante comercial. Su casa se encargará de que sea útil y de que su servicio sea irreprochable».
languages.original_text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

traits.locale_text: «Puesto que el joven Gaprak está tan fascinado por la idea de negociar con xenos, lo acogeré como representante comercial. Su casa se encargará de que sea útil y de que su servicio sea irreprochable».

languages.text: « Puisque le jeune Gaprak a manifesté un certain intérêt à traiter avec les xénos, je le prends dès à présent à mon service en tant que représentant commercial. Je compte sur sa maison pour veiller à ce qu'il se rende utile et que sa conduite soit irréprochable. »
languages.original_text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque le jeune Gaprak a manifesté un certain intérêt à traiter avec les xénos, je le prends dès à présent à mon service en tant que représentant commercial. Je compte sur sa maison pour veiller à ce qu'il se rende utile et que sa conduite soit irréprochable. »

languages.text: "Da der Gedanke von Geschäften mit Xenos den jungen Gaprak derart inspiriert, werde ich ihn als Handelsvertreter in meine Dienste aufnehmen. Sein Haus wird dafür sorgen, dass er sich nützlich macht und seine Arbeit keinen Anlass zu Tadel gibt."
languages.original_text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

traits.locale_text: "Da der Gedanke von Geschäften mit Xenos den jungen Gaprak derart inspiriert, werde ich ihn als Handelsvertreter in meine Dienste aufnehmen. Sein Haus wird dafür sorgen, dass er sich nützlich macht und seine Arbeit keinen Anlass zu Tadel gibt."

languages.text: "Madem genç Gaprak zenolarla birlikte çalışma düşüncesine bu kadar heyecan duyuyor, o hâlde kendisini ticaret temsilcim olarak hizmetime alacağım. Hanesi de ondan fayda görmemi ve hizmetinde kusur olmamasını sağlayacak."
languages.original_text: "Since young Gaprak is so inspired by the thought of conducting business with xenos, I shall take him into my service as a trade representative. His house shall see to it that he makes himself useful and that his service is beyond reproach."

traits.locale_text: "Madem genç Gaprah zenolarla birlikte çalışma düşüncesinden bu kadar heyecan duyuyor, o hâlde kendisini ticaret temsilcim olarak hizmetime alacağım. Hanesi de onun bana faydalı olmasını ve hizmetinde kusur olmamasını sağlayacak."
